revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-N300 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/01/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE |manuf_model=AP699E8N3 |manuf_rev=BT267-4 |availability=only for US/CA |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RT1901 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Padavan ? |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|N300 Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-N300/ Product Page] "AP699E8N3.BT267-4", "REV.1.0", "ASKPCB" and "1427" (06/2014) :is silkscreened on the board in the photos. See also [[ASUS RT-N11P]] ([[ASUS RT-N12E B1]]) and [[ASUS RT-N300 B1]].. ===Overview=== * Two external 5dBi antennas for more powerful and wider coverage * 4 SSIDs help manage bandwidth allocation and access control ===Reviews=== *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-n11p.shtml ''ASUS RT-N11P'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) *[http://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/184-asus-rt-n11p.html ''ASUS RT-N11P'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] (images PCB) ===Forum threads=== * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60674-4#90 ''RTN'''s post on '''iXBT'''] * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-10#303 ''Padavan'''s post on '''iXBT'''] * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:63015:1298#1298 ''RTN'''s post on '''iXBT'''] 
export RT-N300_BASE := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y MT7628=y SSH=y 
EBTABLES=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y AUTODICT=y SHP=y RTN11PB1=y ODMPID=y 
NEW_RGDM=y RA_SKU=y REPEATER=y RA_SKU_IN_DRV=y TCODE=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y 
BTN_WPS_RST=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=n WAN_AT_P4=y LANWAN_LED=y BLINK_LED=y 
SINGLE_2G=y VPNC=y YANDEXDNS=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y LAN50=y 
BTN_WPS_ALLLED=y NEWSSID_REV2=y ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y \
	EDCCA_NEW=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI \
	DRAM=32M 

export RT-N11P_B1 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N11P_B1 += BUILD_NAME="RT-N11P_B1" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN11PB1=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"

export RT-N10P_V3 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N10P_V3 += BASE_MODEL="RT-N11P_B1" BUILD_NAME="RT-N10P_V3" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN10PV3=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"
===See also=== * [http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] * [http://www.asus.com/us/site/routers/DD-WRT/ Asus Routers with DD-WRT firmware support] * [http://event.asus.com/2013/nw/ASUSWRT/index.htm AsusWRT Support List] * [http://www.hub.ru/wiki/Devices_ASUS_WL_Routers Devices ASUS Routers] ====Wireless Router==== * [[ASUS RT-N600]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RTN600/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N300]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-N300/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N14U]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN14U/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N11P]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN11P/ Product Page] __NOTOC__
